description: Erection of a rear dormer roof extension (incorporating a Juliette balcony) and installation of two rooflights to front roofslope
decision_conditions: The erection of a rear dormer roof extension (incorporating a Juliette balcony) and the installation of two rooflights to the front roofslope falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B and C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The information submitted pursuant Condition 5 (Fire Safety Statement) of planning permission 22/01531/HOU (Erection of single storey wrap around side/rear, first floor rear extension. Increasing roof height, erection of hip to gable roof extension with rear dormer and installation of 2nos front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion. Alteration to fenestration) - has been assessed by Officers and is considered acceptable.
Elevations - If your application is for a change of use and no change is proposed to the external elevations please provide a statement that no external changes are proposed.
